dcterms:creator: D. Dua
C. Graff
dcterms:description: A widely used dataset in sign language recognition research consisting of video sequences of Brazilian Sign Language (LIBRAS) gestures performed by different individuals, recorded from multiple viewpoints.
dcterms:title: LIBRAS

dcterms:creator: D. Dua
C. Graff
dcterms:description: A popular face recognition dataset containing grayscale images of faces from 20 different individuals, with varying poses, expressions, and lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: UMIST

dcterms:creator: D. Dua
C. Graff
dcterms:description: A dataset for facial expression analysis consisting of grayscale images of Japanese female faces displaying seven different facial expressions: neutral, happiness, sadness, surprise, anger, disgust, and fear.
dcterms:title: JAFFE

dcterms:creator: D. Dua
C. Graff
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for classification tasks, consisting of grayscale images of digits from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: USPS

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created for testing purposes, typically used in experiments to validate algorithms.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset
